name: LobbyFacts Data
description: The API for LobbyFacts is made to allow easy access to up-to-date, structured information about registered interests, persons and other organisations. It provides both entity-centric access which can be used to find and retrieve data about individual data items as well as a reporting interface which exposes pre-defined views of the data, including aggregated overviews per country etc.
